name: Asynchronous
description:
--ASYNCHRONOUS--

You have completed the perfect run.

But can you do it backwards?

_____

Asynchronous is a bullet-hell shoot 'em up - played in reverse. You start at the end of stage 1 - It has been completed perfectly and you must un-play the level - too many deviations from the original timeline and it is game over.

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys to Move

"A" Key to un-fire

"S" Key toggles auto-fire

F4 - Toggles Full-screen

NOTE: Stage Complete screen is just for aesthetics - any key will skip this scene

TOOLS:

Game Maker Studio 1.4

Aseprite

Bosca Ceoil

Audacity

BFXR

and special thanks to the CRT Pixel Shader for Game Maker.

_____

This game was made in a few days, all art, sound, music and programming (aside from the CRT Pixel Shader) was done by me for the Brackey's 2020.2 Game Jam.
